verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H3372>fears<s%> <S%H3050>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H2654>delights<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> will be <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> The <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>well<s%> with the <S%H376>man<s%> who deals <S%H2603>graciously<s%> and <S%H3867>lends.<s%> He will <S%H3557>maintain<s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
For he will <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H2143>remembered<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>news.<s%> His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> <S%H982>trusting<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5564>established.<s%> He will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> in the end when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>

He has <S%H6340>dispersed,<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H34>poor.<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%> His <S%H7161>horn<s%> will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> with <S%H3519>honor.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3707>it,<s%> and be grieved. He shall <S%H2786>gnash<s%> with his <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and melt <S%H4549>away.<s%> The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H6>perish.<s%>
